Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Wintermute
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
A Wintermute snow crawler. While generally slower compared to most vehicles, the Wintermute more than makes up for this with it's near indifference to most terrain, granting it strong off-road capabilities.

Despite being called the winter-"mute" this vehicle has quite the noisy reputation.

Due to it's impressive traversal capabilities, the Wintermute is the go to for many research teams and exploration vessels, it will get you to where you need to go as long as the planet is vaguely habitable and you've got enough fuel.

<color=#4ec9e4>Roles:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x3
<color=#4ec9e4>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Garbage Truck
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
An industrial garbage hauler that can potentially carry an insanely significant amount of cargo. While it cannot hold very much fuel or move very fast in comparison, its function of large-scale transport more than makes up for it.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Chevrolet Tahoe
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Chevrolet Tahoe, are full-size SUVs and other trucks from General Motors, offered since 1994 and 1991, respectively.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Chevrolet Tahoe (SO)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Chevrolet Tahoe, are full-size SUVs and other trucks from General Motors, offered since 1994 and 1991, respectively.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Chevrolet Tahoe (PD)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Chevrolet Tahoe, are full-size SUVs and other trucks from General Motors, offered since 1994 and 1991, respectively.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Land Rover Range Rover Sport
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Land Rover Range Rover Sport, generally known as the Range Rover Sport, is a mid-size luxury SUV produced under their Range Rover marque.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: M60A3 MBT
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description:
A general main battle tank, the Marshal is an improved combat vehicle that performs well in any engagement. Performs better in less favourable terrain with all sides armoured, the thinnest plating being at the rear near the engine.

Minimal armour improvements compared to previous tier tanks, instead it has a more powerful main gun and a secondary gun. Can fire while moving, as it requires one driver and two gunners; one for each weapon system.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Machine gunner x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford LTD Crown Victoria
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford LTD (pronounced ell-TEE-dee) is a range of automobiles manufactured by Ford for the 1965 to 1986 model years.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford LTD Crown Victoria Police
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford LTD (pronounced ell-TEE-dee) is a range of automobiles manufactured by Ford for the 1965 to 1986 model years.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford LTD Crown Victoria PD
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford LTD (pronounced ell-TEE-dee) is a range of automobiles manufactured by Ford for the 1965 to 1986 model years.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford LTD Crown Victoria SD

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: AM General M998
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle (HUMMWV) is a family of light, four-wheel drive, military trucks and utility vehicles. AM General M998.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: AM General M998 (Heavy)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle (HUMMWV) is a family of light, four-wheel drive, military trucks and utility vehicles. AM General M998. With heavy Armour and Wheel protection give more vehicle protection but less mobility.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: AM General M998 (Light)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle (HUMMWV) is a family of light, four-wheel drive, military trucks and utility vehicles. AM General M998. With removed truck lid and light armour make the vehicle drive more faster but weaker.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: M35A2 (Troop)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The M35 2-ton cargo truck is a long-lived 2-ton 66 cargo truck initially used by the United States Army and subsequently utilized by many nations around the world. Over time it evolved into a family of specialized vehicles.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: M35A2 (Cargo)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The M35 2-ton cargo truck is a long-lived 2-ton 66 cargo truck initially used by the United States Army and subsequently utilized by many nations around the world. Over time it evolved into a family of specialized vehicles.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: M35A2
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The M35 2-ton cargo truck is a long-lived 2-ton 66 cargo truck initially used by the United States Army and subsequently utilized by many nations around the world. Over time it evolved into a family of specialized vehicles.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: F-350 Ambulance 2
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Type 1 ambulance on a Ford F350. A versatile choice, popular with EMS, hospitals and fire departments.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: F-350 Ambulance 1
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Type 1 ambulance on a Ford F350. A versatile choice, popular with EMS, hospitals and fire departments.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Explorer
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford Explorer is a range of SUVs manufactured by Ford Motor Company since the 1991 model year.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Police Interceptor Utility
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford Police Interceptor Utility (FPIU) nameplate was introduced as the SUV of the Ford Police Interceptor range in 2012.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Police Interceptor Utility Police
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford Police Interceptor Utility (FPIU) nameplate was introduced as the SUV of the Ford Police Interceptor range in 2012.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Police Interceptor Utility Sheriff
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford Police Interceptor Utility (FPIU) nameplate was introduced as the SUV of the Ford Police Interceptor range in 2012.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Crown Victoria Police Interceptor
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Ford Crown Victoria Police Interceptor, a classic america police vehicle serve the police force from 1992 to 2011.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Crown Victoria
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Ford Crown Victoria, a full-size sedan that was marketed and manufactured by Ford.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Crown Victoria Police Interceptor SO
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Ford Crown Victoria Police Interceptor, a classic america police vehicle serve the police force from 1992 to 2011.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford Crown Victoria Police Interceptor PD

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Bell 412 Helicopter (Sheriff)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Bell 412 helicopter has been in production since 1981. A utility helicopter of the Hiey family manufactured by Bell Helicopter.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Bell 412 Helicopter (Police)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Bell 412 helicopter has been in production since 1981. A utility helicopter of the Hiey family manufactured by Bell Helicopter.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Bell 412 Helicopter
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Bell 412 helicopter has been in production since 1981. A utility helicopter of the Hiey family manufactured by Bell Helicopter.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: BearCat G3
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Lenco BearCat is a wheeled SWAT vehicle designed for military and law enforcement use. It is in use by numerous military forces and law enforcement agencies around the world.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: BearCat G3 (Police)
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Lenco BearCat is a wheeled SWAT vehicle designed for military and law enforcement use. It is in use by numerous military forces and law enforcement agencies around the world.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford B700 Bus Government
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford B series is a bus chassis that was manufactured by the Ford Motor Company. Produced across six generations from 1948 to 1998, the B series was a variant of the medium-duty Ford F series.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Ford B700 Bus
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Ford B series is a bus chassis that was manufactured by the Ford Motor Company. Produced across six generations from 1948 to 1998, the B series was a variant of the medium-duty Ford F series.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Pierce Arrow Pumper FD Line
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Pierce Arrow, the industry's first custom cab-forward model constructed entirely out of aluminum. Active from 1901 to 1938.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Pierce Arrow Pumper FD Classic
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Pierce Arrow, the industry's first custom cab-forward model constructed entirely out of aluminum. Active from 1901 to 1938.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Pierce Arrow Pumper FD
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Pierce Arrow, the industry's first custom cab-forward model constructed entirely out of aluminum. Active from 1901 to 1938.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Pierce Arrow Pumper
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The Pierce Arrow, the industry's first custom cab-forward model constructed entirely out of aluminum. Active from 1901 to 1938.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: ShoppingCart
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The common shopping carts in supermarkets are not fundamentally different from the wreckage on the wasteland outside. You can use them to transport a large amount of goods in a colony at once, or push them to trade

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: DumpTruck
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Terror incarnation, car accident disclaimer, otherworldly portal - you can call it whatever you want, but in reality it's just a less useful mud truck

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: BigBread
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A van, with an additional row of seats, is capable of serving as a personnel carrier for impoverished colonies.It is suitable for driving on the road, but its off-road capability is slightly poor

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Cruiser
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A sturdy, durable, and inexpensive pickup truck with four seats and a decent cargo box. Its off-road capabilities are not inferior, and everyone likes it

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Fellowtown
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: There is a dual mounted anti-aircraft gun in the cargo box of the pickup truck, with a huge recoil force that may overturn the vehicle body. Armed elements in war zones are quite fond of such modifications

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Katyusha
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: The militants ingeniously installed the aviation rocket nest on the pickup truck, now it looks like the once famous "Katyusha" rocket launcher

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Sturmgeschutz
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A pickup truck equipped with a BMP turret, surrounded by armor protection, is often used to destroy defensive fortifications. Be careful of its recoil!

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Vasilek
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A truck equipped with large caliber mortars capable of bombing enemy bases at extremely long distances

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: dreadnought
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A heavy-duty trailer truck commonly used in the transportation industry, but in the hands of armed militants, it can be transformed into a land-based firepower platform.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: land carrier
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A huge and sturdy mobile platform, originally designed for transporting giant components, but armed militants in the rim world transformed it into a flagship of a land fleet.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Mud Head
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: Terror incarnation, car accident disclaimer, otherworldly portal - you can call it whatever you want, It's just a dump truck that can freely place items in the trunk.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Sand patrol
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A sturdy pickup truck, a common vehicle used by armed militants, when unsure of what to do, placing a machine gun on its fully opened trunk is definitely the right thing to do.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Z277 Madness Accelerator
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: An armored vehicle fielded by Kaia Corporation. Based on a certain anti-air platform, its capable of mowing down lightly armored vehicles or infantry.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Saturn 7 Heavy Tank
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A Heavy Tank fielded by Kaia Corporation. Rarely seen outside their military bays due to its logistical profile.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Raptor Type-E
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A VTOL/STOL aircraft fielded by Kaida Corporation. Twice the speed of sound. Full VTOL capabilities. 5000Kg in explosive payload.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Armored Transport
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: An Armored Transport fielded by Kaida Corporation. Slow, and lightly armored but can take a lot of beating due to its sheer size. Has a lot of space for cargo and passengers. Great for long excursions.
